meanings.definition: A short period of sleep, especially during the day.
meanings.sent1: After a long morning of playing, the toddler took a quick nap in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: I like to take a nap after lunch to recharge for the rest of the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to take a nap right in the middle of the sunny spot on the floor.
meanings.sent4: As the sun gently kissed her face, she drifted off into a peaceful nap.
meanings.sent5: The nap under the shady tree felt like a refreshing break from the summer heat.

meanings.sent1: I will nap for a few minutes before we continue our journey.
meanings.sent2: She napped on the train ride home after a tiring day at work.
meanings.sent3: The student decided to nap for a bit to clear his mind before the exam.
meanings.sent4: The tired hiker found a cozy spot to nap under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The baby will nap peacefully in the rocking chair.

meanings.definition: A soft or fuzzy surface on fabric or leather.
meanings.sent1: The blanket had a velvety nap that made it extra cozy.
meanings.sent2: She ran her fingers over the nap of the suede jacket.
meanings.sent3: The nap on the new carpet made it feel luxurious underfoot.
meanings.sent4: The nap of the fabric caught the light in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The cat curled up on the soft nap of the couch for a nap.
